channel.title: All Projects on My Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in All Projects on My Portfolio

item.title: AI Fall Detector
item.description: AI Fall Detector The perpose of this project is for safty of elder who live alone. When the elder fall down by accident or something else, then program can detect and alert so we can help in time. Testing video .video-player{ z-index: 1 !important; } Your browser does not support the video tag. Result testing video We use MediaPipe Pose module to draw landmark on body to create data for training and predicting.

item.title: Cashier and Stock Management on Smart Phone
item.description: Cashier and Stock Management on Smart Phone The contest is about creating application for logistic. my team has a group of 3 people, named Trooper Team. My team develop mobile app for small store that cannot affort large system to manage stock and cashier. In present day everyone has a smartphone, so we create a POS system that fit in smartphone with barcode scanner feature. Presentation video .video-player{ z-index: 1 !

item.title: Fire detector
item.description: Fire detector This project using ESP32 with infared sensor to detect heat and alert to mobile phone via line notify. Flow Chart Fire detector Flowchart Testing video .video-player{ z-index: 1 !important; } Your browser does not support the video tag. Result testing video Result in line notify

item.title: IoT Home Automation Project
item.description: IoT Home Automation Project This project is my internship project. My job is about learning how Zigbee Protocol work, design and develops system to work with IoT devices without internet. Also create an API to provide ability for user to config how IoT devices should work together in if-then condition. I developed a program that run as service on NanoPi Neo board as a gateway to recieve data from sensors (Zigbee devices) and check value from sensors if the value is match with condition that user had config then trigger the action to other devices.

item.title: Manga Text Cleaner
item.description: Manga Text Cleaner This project use OpenCV and Tesseract OCR to detect text box and balloon. Program diagram Program diagram Program process in step 1.Find text balloon by finding circle and squre shape 2.Find word to comfirm the shape that have found is text balloon 3.Fill color only shape that have text in side.

item.title: Smart CCTV
item.description: Smart CCTV This job I recieve from my professor from university, working together with another student. My job is develop CCTV program to detect thief using machine learning and other algorithms to detect and predict situation and give score to estimate risk. Some of example video from the project .video-player{ z-index: 1 !important; } Your browser does not support the video tag. Testing face detection for finding helmet and mask .

item.title: Smart Home Model
item.description: Smart Home Model This project using STM32 Microcontroller to read data from sensor and control light or fan in the house. House model Full Circuit Full circuit Circuit design Fan - motor and temperature sensor Motor and temperature circuit design Hardware example Lamp - LED and LDR LED and LDR circuit design Hardware example Top Light - LED and Ultrasonic sensor LED and Ultrasonic circuit design Hardware example Presentation video .

item.title: Web Front-end
item.description: Web Front-end This project is a thesis of my friend from different major who don’t know how to code asking me for help to develop form on website to open bag order and show status. Web preview video .video-player{ z-index: 1 !important; } Your browser does not support the video tag. Web preview video - open paper bag order .
